name: Digital storytelling and the ECG: a case of generalized fatigue and difficult conversations
name_original: Digital storytelling and the ECG: a case of generalized fatigue and difficult conversations
description: This is a project titled "Digital storytelling and the ECG: a case of generalized fatigue and difficult conversations." It is a part of the final project through the Distinction in Applied Medical and Health Humanities program. Thank you to MCASOM, The Dolores Jean Lavins Center for Humanities in Medicine, and Dr. Scott Breitinger for their support. Thank you to Frances Grimaldo and Marc Davis for their programming expertise and guidance!
